page.title: 04FARMS KIBBLESWORTH/HEDLEYFEL
page.content: {COOPER HOUSE FARM}_180 acres.Situated 1km SW of Kibblesworth.Mainly live- stock with 200 sheep and 30 bullocks. {RAVENSWORTH GRANGE}_205 acres mixed farm.1km NW of Kibblesworth.180 sheep 11 cows.Crops_rape,hay,silage,barley.{ {OLD RAVENSWORTH}109 acres mixed farm. 2.5km E of Marley Hill.Crops silage, wheat,corn and hay. 12 beef cattle 12 cows 16 calves 100 sheep and 150 lambs {HEDLEY HALL FARM}220 acres.2.5km.S.E. of Marley Hill.Mixed arable farm.Crops growing grass,barley,rape,wheat.200 sheep,350 lambs and some beasts. {KIBBLESWORTH GRANGE}and{KIBBLESWORTH {WEST FARMS}in Kibblesworth work as one farm of 530 acres.The{WEST}is a dairy farm with 34 cows.The{GRANGE}is mixed arable growing potatoes,wheat,barley, rape,silage and grass for beef cattle. {CAUSEY HALL FARM}built circa 1850 no other information available.
